#summary Overview of third party libraries used by Ivysvn.

= Third Party Libraries =

The Ivy Subversion resolver uses the following third-party libraries, the version numbers indicate the versions that the Ivy Subversion resolver was built and tested against, your mileage with other versions may vary.

  * [http://ant.apache.org Apache Ant] 1.7.0
  * [http://ant.apache.org/ivy/ Ivy] 2.0 beta 2
  * [http://www.trilead.com/Products/Trilead-SSH-2-Java/ Trilead SSH for Java] build 211
  * [http://svnkit.com/ SVNKit] 1.1.6
